amendment.description: Amendment adds to the bill the text of the "Local Law Enforcement Hate Crimes Prevention Act of 2005".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in the Congressional Record.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 199 (Roll no. 469).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Conyers.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 199 (Roll no. 469).
